nodes.bodyText: I played with it a little bit and it seems that unless you specify statusCode(200), it will keep passing as for example Quarkus will return 404 and HTML body when I change the endpoint or delete a bpmn. When I change the matcher to nullValue() then it is complaining that id contains Resource not found but expected is null, which is weird as id is not even on the page. I will probably file an issue for that.
Same here, we can also include src/test/resources.
